# iru_blueprint_ota_profile (Ephemeral Resource)

Fetch the manual enrollment profile (.mobileconfig) for a blueprint as an ephemeral resource.

## Example Usage

```terraform
ephemeral "iru_blueprint_ota_profile" "example" {
  blueprint_id = "c0148e35-c734-4402-b2fb-1c61aab72550"
}

output "manual_profile" {
  value = ephemeral.iru_blueprint_ota_profile.example.profile_xml
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `blueprint_id` (String)

### Read-Only

- `profile_xml` (String)
